title: Is virtual reality actually addictive to some people? - Quora

response.answer_text: Of course. Anything that is pleasant to experience, which offers an escape from intolerable circumstances, can be addictive for some. This includes VR, video games, sex, gambling, alcohol and other drugs, and even meditation. However, change the vessel housing the person to something pleasant, and nothing will addict them. Google the Rat Park Experiments; you’ll see what I mean.
